name: Sushi Drop (Merge Puzzle)
description:
Available on # DROP AND MERGE SUSHI BLOCKS!

Merge the same sushi blocks to make great sushi!

Can you merge the sushi ordered by the customer and clear the stage?

How expensive & luxury sushi can you make? Try it right now!

`Sushi Drop` is a simple, classic puzzle game that can be enjoyed by everyone in the family!

# HOW TO PLAY
  • Drop the sushi block onto another same block with the same number.
  • Merge them into a higher sushi with high number!
  • You can remove the blocks by using bomb booster!
  • You can levelup the sushi block by using level up booster!
  • Try to remove multiple blocks at a time to get awesome bonus!
  • Try to collect new chefs with coins you earned.
# FEATURES
  • NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy block puzzle anytime, anywhere!
  • FREE TO PLAY & Suitable for all ages.
  • NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy Block Puzzle at your own pace!
# NOTES
  • `Sushi Drop` supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
  • `Sushi Drop` contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, video to house ads.
  • `Sushi Drop` is free to play, however, you may purchase Ad-Free item.
